SortAlgDemo
Class RandomData

java.lang.Object
  SortAlgDemo.RandomData
public class RandomData
extends java.lang.Object

The RandomData class is a class that generates random float values for all sorting algorithms. In order to investigate the accuracy of various sorting operation performed by the software, this class plays an essential role to let us generate bulk input data for intensive debugging.
